channel.title: Ipc on Srikanth Perinkulam
channel.description: Recent content in Ipc on Srikanth Perinkulam

item.title: Replied to:IndieWeb podcast club
item.author: ssphugo@srkn.anonaddy.com (Srikanth Perinkulam)
item.description:
Love the idea! Essentially I guess this falls into the bigger picture of organically building ‘Indiweb groups’ which gets people more engaged in discussions around the open-web (and otherwise!) and would be a welcoming segway for those who are already on the verge of taking that step!

in reply to: IndieWeb podcast club

â€¦like a book club, but for podcasts, and distributed over the indieweb. Anyone interested? Here is how I imagine it would work.

Srikanth Perinkulam
